caption:
"A possibly metallic tool-type object with a matte silver finish and angular grooves. Inconclusive evidence for its exact function, but it may be used as a wrench or specialized clamp. Seen in a workshop environment near assembly parts."

"A glossy ceramic mug with deep blue coloring and rounded shape. The tapered rim suggests it is made for holding hot drinks. Has a comfortable handle and flat base. Sitting beside a coffee maker and jar of beans on a kitchen counter."

"A plastic container-type object with translucent amber coloring. Fluted body shape and water droplets on surface. Likely floral display container. Found on windowsill with plants and pruning shears nearby."

"A metallic tool-type object, matte silver with angular grooves. Ambiguous function between wrench or specialized clamp. Seen in workshop environment near assembly parts."

"A white stool with a circular seat and four legs. Made from wood or a similar material. Provides seating support. Positioned next to a wooden desk with drawers, surrounded by indoor plants and other office supplies."
